data.title: Infocom Corporation
data.meta_description: 本企業のHistoryをご覧いただけます。
data.text:
1983 Feb. Established as Nissho-Iwai Computer Systems Inc., wholly owned subsidiary of Nissho-Iwai Corporation

1987

June Changed name to Nissho-Iwai Infocom Systems Inc.

1999

Apr. Changed name to Nissho-Iwai Infocom Inc. Established Infocom Services Inc. (presently consolidated subsidiary Infocom East Japan Corporation)

2000

Apr. Changed name to Infocom Corp.

2001

Mar. Relocated the head office to Kanda Surugadai, Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo Apr. Merged with Teijin Systems Technology, wholly owned subsidiary of Teijin Limited June Established Infocom America Inc. in the United States (presently consolidated subsidiary) Oct. Changed name of consolidated subsidiary TST System Inc. to Infocom West Japan Corporation

2002

Mar. Listed shares for trading on the over-the-counter market (presently the JASDAQ (standard) market of the Tokyo Stock Exchange)

2003

Oct. Established Infovec Inc. (presently consolidated subsidiary Grandit Corporation)

2004

Dec. Listed shares for trading on the JASDAQ securities exchange

2006

Mar. Owned the data center in Yokohama City

2008

July Relocated headquarters to Jingumae, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo

2010

Apr. Listed shares for trading on the JASDAQ market of the Osaka Securities Exchange Oct. Listed shares for trading on the JASDAQ (standard) market of the Osaka Securities Exchange

2013

Apr. Established Net Business Establishment Preparation Co., Ltd. (presently consolidated subsidiary Amutus Corporation) Acquired Radiology Division System Business from AJS Inc. July Listed shares for trading on the JASDAQ (standard) market of the Tokyo Stock Exchange Established Iwanuma Minna no Ie (Iwanuma City, Miyagi Pref.) Oct. Amutus Corporation launched operations

2014

May Established Everysense, Inc. by joint investment Aug. Established Fenox Infocom Venture Company V, L.P. in the United States (presently consolidated subsidiary)

2015

Nov. Formed business and equity alliance with Solasto Corporation; entered the comprehensive regional care and nursing care sector

2017

Aug. Sold the data center in Yokohama City Oct. Established PT. GnB Accelerator Asia in Indonesia (presently PT. Infocom Global Indonesia)

2018

Nov. Changed listing of shares to the First Section of the Tokyo Stock Exchange 2019 May Converted Staffplus Co., Ltd. to a consolidated subsidiary (presently consolidated subsidiary) Converted Peanutoon, Inc. in Korea to a consolidated subsidiary (presently consolidated subsidiary) July

Established Aldo Agency Global Co., Ltd. by joint investment

2021 July Established AmuLink Corp. by joint investment(presently consolidated subsidiary) Oct. Converted MEDICAL CREATE Corp. to a consolidated subsidiary (presently consolidated subsidiary)
